item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Darwin D. Wu and I’m a software engineer based in San Francisco. I’m a self-taught engineer, graduated with a Political Science/Economics degree but have felt in love with software engineering since my senior year and have made the jump into this world. I’m mostly what people call a Full-Stack engineer and DevOps/SRE, but currently more focus on the backend and ops side these days. Interested in all kinds of technologies, especially operating systems, compilers and the lower level stuff.
